hours_text:
# Aerospace Museum of California 

#### Where Curiosity Takes Flight

Prepare for an unforgettable journey through aviation history and innovation at the Aerospace Museum of California. 

From rare military jets and historic aircraft to hands-on STEM exhibits that engage kids and adults alike, our museum offers something for every explorer. 

Use this page to find tickets, hours, and everything you need to plan an unforgetable day.

[ Get Tickets ](/purchase/p/adult-general-admission)

### Visit the Museum

  * Hours 

Tuesday - Sunday  
9:00 am - 5:00 pm

** _Closed Mondays_**  
** _Closed Major Holidays_**

  * Prices 

Adults (18+): $18  
Youth (3-17): $15  
Children (2 & Under): Free  
Seniors (65+): $15  
Veterans: $15  
Active Military (w/ ID): Free  
Teacher (w/ ID): $15  
Students (18+ w/ ID): $15

[Get Tickets](/purchase/general-admission)

  * Memberships 

FREE admission year round with an active membership. 

Explore Memberships

  * Book a Group 

Group Tours and Field trip pricing is available. 

[Learn More](/field-trip)

  * Free Events 

Check out our Events Calendar. We host monthly events that are included in General Admission

[Events](/events)

### Flight Zone

Step into the **Flight Zone** —a state-of-the-art STEM learning lab featuring **six independent flight simulator stations powered by X‑Plane 12** , complete with high‑end gaming graphics and dual 27″ monitors. 

Under the guidance of experienced aviation instructors, visitors of all ages—from curio...
admission_text:
# More to Love with Memberships

[ Explore Memberships ](https://terrier-green-p3cy.squarespace.com/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

## All Members Enjoy Perks!

Fuel your passion for aerospace with a **membership** that lasts all year long. 

Whether for yourself or as a thoughtful gift, membership gives you unlimited access to explore our exhibits, relive history, and discover something new with every visit.

#### As a **Member** you enjoy:

  * #### Unlimited free admission for one year

  * #### Discounts on special events and programs

  * #### 10% savings at the Gift Shop and Old Crow Café

  * #### Invitations to exclusive member-only events

[ Sign Up Today! ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

[ ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

## There is a Membership for Everyone

**Individual Membership $85**  
For the independent aviation lover that wants to learn year round.

[ membership info ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

[ ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

**Traveler Membership $200  
** Membership allows you to bring any _5 guests_. The North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association® membership is included.

[ ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

**Family Membership $100  
** Membership Benefits Named Cardholder + 1 adult and up to _2 youth_ (up to age 17).

[ ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

**Family+ Membership $150  
** Membership Benefits Named Cardholder + 1 adult and up to _4 youth_ (up to age 17).

[ ](/purchase/p/museum-memberships)

## Our 2025 Impact

Honoring the past. Inspiring more than **65,000** young minds every year.  
Your support of the museum helps give Sacramento kids access to hands-on STEM experiences—opening doors to future careers.

### 2,649  
Kids In Summer Programs

### **65,133**  
Student Visitors

### 100%  
Receiving Scholarships 

### **143,149**  
Museum Visitors

### 3,549  
Total Camp Days
